post.text: Today - I outlined a plan for American economic revival - it is bold, ambitious, forward-looking plan to massively INCREASE JOBS, WAGES, INCOMES and opportunities for the people of our country!

comment.author: Julianna
comment.text: Mr. Trump. I do want to vote for you and agree on so many things however I hate that you disrespect our neighbors from Mexico. You give such bad example of superiority, discrimination etc. I do want the wall for security but I think your approach on saying MÃ©xico will pay for the wall..... when you can be more proper and neighborly and say " we will build a wall together to protect our borders and neighbors etc. " Instead you keep on being an AH so sad, you could have had most of the Mexicans vote.

replies.author: Riley
replies.text: This is so silly - UNLESS you are saying that "George" is an idiot. Why don't you apply your logic to ALL universities whose graduates FAIL in business, and in LIFE? Ridiculous charges against a real estate, investment "advice" course. Real estate investments are not for the faint of heart, nor for the untalented investors.
